p: The data were retrieved from accurate databases including Worldometer 2, WHO 3, the Center of Disease Control and Prevention [ 16], and the Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report series (provided from Center of Disease Control and Prevention), according to the userâ€™s guide of data sources for patient registries [ 17]. Due to the rapid increase in data, the analysis in this study was performed on the 12 th and 23 rd of March 2020.
